name: Hamster Mania
description:
If the game just shows a black screen at startup, just give it a couple of seconds to load!

The hamsters in this colony are lazy - really lazy. You have to move them to the surface and let them gather food. When they are tired, put them in their tiny beds. 

Keep your hamsters happy, and the food storage full before winter comes.

Controls:

Drag & drop hamsters with the mouse. Scroll the view up and down by moving the coursor closer to the top or bottom edge of the screen
